titles.title: A bill to provide for the payment of impact aid to certain school districts.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

bill.summary: 3/19/1987--Introduced. Amends Federal law to entitle a local educational agency to receive impact aid payments when: (1) the population of the school district is below a specified number; and (2) the United States owns Federal property aggregating 40 percent or more of the total acreage in the district.
